title: What can the  user do when the mobile phone prompts to enter a password during the startup? If the password is forgotten, what can the user do?
answer:
There are two passwords, mobile phone code and PIN code.
Mobile phone code: Provided by the mobile phone. You can get the  initial value in user manual. It can be changed.
PIN1 code: Provided by the intelligent card. It is usually 1234. Check the description of the intelligent card or make an inquiry to the operator.
When the password is forgotten, contact the relevant equipment provider or operator.
